articles.author: Monica Garrett, Michelle Krupa and Caroll Alvarado, CNN
articles.title: Floodwaters overtake trucks and cars in downtown Dallas as flash flooding threat persists
articles.description: Flooding overwhelmed cars and trucks early Monday on interstates in downtown Dallas as flash flooding continues to threaten into the morning rush hour.

articles.title: 'The end of an era for the Cheneys': Zeleny on Liz Cheney's primary defeat - CNN Video
articles.description: Following her primary defeat, Rep. Liz Cheney (R-WY) discussed her possible 2024 plans on NBC's "TODAY" show. CNN's chief national affairs correspondent Jeff Zeleny has more.

articles.author: Gawon Bae, Kathleen Magramo
articles.title: Woman believed to be mother of children found dead in suitcases is in South Korea, say Seoul police
articles.description: A woman believed to be the mother of two children whose remains were found in suitcases in New Zealand is in South Korea, a Seoul police official told CNN on Monday.
articles.content:
A woman believed to be the mother of two children whose remains were found in suitcases in New Zealand earlier this month is in South Korea, a Seoul police official told CNN on Monday.

articles.title: Teachers at Ohio's largest school district vote to strike just before start of school year
articles.description: Teachers at Ohio's largest school district voted to go on strike Sunday, just days before school is scheduled to start, according to the teachers' union.

articles.title: 2 Arkansas deputies suspended and 1 officer on administrative leave after video posted of violent encounter with man outside store
articles.description: Three Arkansas law enforcement officers have been removed from duty and are under investigation, their departments confirmed, after bystander video captured them appearing to punch and knee a suspect during an arrest Sunday.

articles.title: Pence's 2024 hopes loom over potential testimony to Jan. 6 committee

articles.title: Opinion: Mitch McConnell just made the 2022 election about Trump's political future
articles.description: Mitch McConnell's brutal assessment that Republicans may not win back the Senate because of a lack of "candidate quality" was an acknowledgement of the GOP's challenges in 2022. Dean Obeidallah writes it was also a dig at ex-President Donald Trump.

articles.title: Opinion: Rudy Giuliani's long, hard fall

articles.title: At least 11 Republican nominees for state elections chief have disputed the legitimacy of the 2020 election
articles.description: In at least 11 states, the Republican nominee for the job of overseeing future elections is someone who has questioned, rejected or tried to overturn the results of the 2020 election.
